blocks.name: drgext0g
blocks.content: The additive neutral element of a division ring extension. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm drgext0g(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1))), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdr)))
  sralmod0(cfv(c0g, c0), c1, c0, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
  eqidd(cfv(c0g, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  subrgss(c2, c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm drgext0g(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(0 ` c0)=(0 ` c1))
  ⊣ c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ DivRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(0 ` c0)=(0 ` c1)), (w0 → c0 ∈ DivRing))
  sralmod0((0 ` c0), c1, c0, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
  eqidd((0 ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ⊆(Base ` c0), c2 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
  subrgss(c2, c0, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
}

blocks.name: drgextvsca
blocks.content: The scalar multiplication operation of a division ring extension. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jul-2023.)

blocks.name: drgext0gsca
blocks.content: The additive neutral element of the scalar field of a division ring extension. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm drgext0gsca(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(csra, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, co(c1, cress, c2)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, co(c1, cress, c2))), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c1, crg))
  drngring(c1)
  ringmnd(c1)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c1)))
  subrgsubg(c2, c1)
  subg0cl(c2, c1, cfv(c0g, c1))
  ress0g(c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c2, cfv(cbs, c1), co(c1, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(c1, cress, c2))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  drgext0g(c1, c0, c2, w0)
  fveq2d(c0g, co(c1, cress, c2), cfv(csca, c0), w0)
  srasca(c1, c2, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(csra, c1), c2)))
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  subrgss(c2, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm drgext0gsca(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(0 ` c0)=(0 `(Scalar ` c0)))
  ⊣ c0 =((subringAlg ` c1)` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ DivRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(SubRing ` c1))
} = {
  3eqtr3d((0 ` c0), (0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (0 ` c1), (0 `(c1[|`s]c2)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (0 ` c1)=(0 `(c1[|`s]c2)), c1 ∈ Mnd, (0 ` c1)∈ c2, c2 ⊆(Base ` c1))
  3syl(w0, c1 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ Ring)
  drngring(c1)
  ringmnd(c1)
  3syl(w0, (0 ` c1)∈ c2, c2 ∈(SubRing ` c1), c2 ∈(SubGrp ` c1))
  subrgsubg(c2, c1)
  subg0cl(c2, c1, (0 ` c1))
  ress0g(c1, (0 ` c1), c2, (Base ` c1), (c1[|`s]c2))
  eqid((c1[|`s]c2))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  drgext0g(c1, c0, c2, w0)
  fveq2d(c0g, (c1[|`s]c2), (Scalar ` c0), w0)
  srasca(c1, c2, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 =((subringAlg ` c1)` c2))
  syl(w0, c2 ⊆(Base ` c1), c2 ∈(SubRing ` c1))
  subrgss(c2, c1, (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
}

blocks.name: drgextsubrg
blocks.content: The scalar field is a subring of a division ring extension. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm drgextsubrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c2), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c2, cress, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdr))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1))), wi(w0, wcel(c2, cdr)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1))), wceq(c3, co(c2, cress, c0)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1))), wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdr)))
  srasubrg(c0, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c2), c0)))
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  subrgss(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm drgextsubrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1))
  ⊣ c1 =((subringAlg ` c2)` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ DivRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(c2[|`s]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ DivRing)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)), (w0 → c2 ∈ DivRing))
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)), c3 =(c2[|`s]c0))
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)), (w0 → c3 ∈ DivRing))
  srasubrg(c0, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 =((subringAlg ` c2)` c0))
  syl(w0, c0 ⊆(Base ` c2), c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2))
  subrgss(c0, c2, (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
}

blocks.name: drgextlsp
blocks.content: The scalar field is a subspace of a subring algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm drgextlsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(clss, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c2), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c2, cress, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdr))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(clss, c1))), wi(w0, wcel(c2, cdr)))
  islssd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, cfv(clss, c1), cfv(csca, c1), c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cvsca, c1), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(csca, c1), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cplusg, c1), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cvsca, c1), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(clss, c1), w0)
  sseqtrd(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  srabase(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  3syl(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)), wcel(cfv(cur, c2), c0))
  subrg1cl(c0, c2, cfv(cur, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c2))
  ne0i(cfv(cur, c2), c0)
  3eltr4d(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2)), c0, co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(cbs, c3), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs2)), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c3, cdr))
  drnggrp(c3)
  eqeltrd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cmulr, c3), w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(cmulr, c2), w0)
  sravsca(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cmulr, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  ressmulr(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2), cfv(cmulr, c2), c3, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c3, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)), wcel(c3, crg))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, crg), wcel(c3, cdr))
  drngring(c3)
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  simpr1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))))
  fveq2d(cbs, c3, cfv(csca, c1), w0)
  syl5eq(c3, cfv(csca, c1), co(c2, cress, c0), w0)
  srasca(c2, c0, c1, w0)
  eleqtrd(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3), c0, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  simpr2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  ringcl(c3, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c3))
  eleqtrd(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c3), c0, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  simpr3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  grpcl(c3, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c3), cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  oveqd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c3), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c3)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c2), w0)
  sraaddg(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c2), c0)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  ressplusg(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2), c3, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  syl(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  subrgss(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c2))
  ressbas2(c0, cfv(cbs, c2), c3, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm drgextlsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(LSubSp ` c1))
  ⊣ c1 =((subringAlg ` c2)` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ DivRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(c2[|`s]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ DivRing)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ∈(LSubSp ` c1)), (w0 → c2 ∈ DivRing))
  islssd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, (LSubSp ` c1), (Scalar ` c1), c1, (Base `(Scalar ` c1)), (Base ` c1), (+ ` c1), (× ` c1), w0)
  eqidd((Scalar ` c1), w0)
  eqidd((Base `(Scalar ` c1)), w0)
  eqidd((Base ` c1), w0)
  eqidd((+ ` c1), w0)
  eqidd((× ` c1), w0)
  eqidd((LSubSp ` c1), w0)
  sseqtrd(c0, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2), w0)
  srabase(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  3syl(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2), (1r ` c2)∈ c0)
  subrg1cl(c0, c2, (1r ` c2))
  eqid((1r ` c2))
  ne0i((1r ` c2), c0)
  3eltr4d(((hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1)[(+ ` c1)]hs2), c0, ((hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1)[(+ ` c3)]hs2), (Base ` c3), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)), ((hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1)[(+ ` c3)]hs2)∈(Base ` c3), c3 ∈ Grp, (hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1)∈(Base ` c3), hs2 ∈(Base ` c3))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0), c3 ∈ Grp)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ DivRing)
  drnggrp(c3)
  eqeltrd((hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1), (Base ` c3), (hs0[(× ` c3)]hs1), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (× ` c1), (× ` c3), w0, (hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0))
  eqtr3d((× ` c1), (× ` c3), (× ` c2), w0)
  sravsca(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, (× ` c2)=(× ` c3), c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2))
  ressmulr(c0, (SubRing ` c2), (× ` c2), c3, c2)
  eqid((× ` c2))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)), (hs0[(× ` c3)]hs1)∈(Base ` c3), c3 ∈ Ring, hs0 ∈(Base ` c3), hs1 ∈(Base ` c3))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0), c3 ∈ Ring)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ Ring, c3 ∈ DivRing)
  drngring(c3)
  eleqtrrd(hs0, (Base ` c3), (Base `(Scalar ` c1)), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))
  simpr1(w0, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1)), hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c0)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0), (Base ` c3)=(Base `(Scalar ` c1)))
  fveq2d(cbs, c3, (Scalar ` c1), w0)
  syl5eq(c3, (Scalar ` c1), (c2[|`s]c0), w0)
  srasca(c2, c0, c1, w0)
  eleqtrd(hs1, (Base ` c3), c0, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))
  simpr2(w0, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1)), hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c0)
  ringcl(c3, hs0, (Base ` c3), hs1, (× ` c3))
  eqid((× ` c3))
  eleqtrd(hs2, (Base ` c3), c0, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))
  simpr3(w0, hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1)), hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c0)
  grpcl(c3, (hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1), (Base ` c3), hs2, (+ ` c3))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((+ ` c3))
  oveqd((hs0[(× ` c1)]hs1), (+ ` c1), hs2, (+ ` c3), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0), (+ ` c1)=(+ ` c3))
  eqtr3d((+ ` c1), (+ ` c3), (+ ` c2), w0)
  sraaddg(c2, c1, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 =((subringAlg ` c2)` c0))
  syl(w0, (+ ` c2)=(+ ` c3), c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2))
  ressplusg(c0, (SubRing ` c2), (+ ` c2), c3, c2)
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base `(Scalar ` c1))∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0), c0 =(Base ` c3))
  syl(w0, c0 =(Base ` c3), c0 ⊆(Base ` c2))
  syl(w0, c0 ⊆(Base ` c2), c0 ∈(SubRing ` c2))
  subrgss(c0, c2, (Base ` c2))
  ressbas2(c0, (Base ` c2), c3, c2)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base `(Scalar ` c1)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c((Base `(Scalar ` c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: drgextgsum
blocks.content: Group sum in a division ring extension. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm drgextgsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(c3, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cress, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  gsumsra(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3, c4, universe, cdr, clvec, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c1, c2, c6, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(c3, clvec), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c5, cdr), wcel(c4, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  sralvec(c0, c5, c4, c3)
  syl(w0, wss(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c4, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  subrgss(c4, c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm drgextgsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=(c3[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ DivRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
  ⊣ c5 =(c0[|`s]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ DivRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  gsumsra(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c3, c4, universe, cdr, clvec, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c1, c2, c6, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, c3 ∈ LVec, c0 ∈ DivRing, c5 ∈ DivRing, c4 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
  sralvec(c0, c5, c4, c3)
  syl(w0, c4 ⊆(Base ` c0), c4 ∈(SubRing ` c0))
  subrgss(c4, c0, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
}
